post.html:
Play Design Hotel is furnished with Taiwanese brand designs that aims at shaping unique and engaging hotel stay experience. It is also one of the world’s first guest customizable hotel where guests are invited to select different design furniture and artefacts using an online reservation system.

Play Design Hotel is situated in a unique area, which is categorised as the west district of Taipei. Unlike the growing east district of Taipei, the development of the west counterpart is significantly slower. The west district of Taipei has a comfortable living pace and comprises several smaller districts, which have various different styles that enrich the experience of the visitors.

East of Play Design Hotel is the youthful district – the fashionable Zhongshan Business District(中山商圈). The designer stores, coffee shops, and clothing stores are testaments of Taipei’s taste, attitude, and interpretation of life.

West of the Play Design Hotel is the nostalgic Taipei – Dadaocheng(大稻埕), full of the glamor of old Taipei. Closely situated grocery stores, herb stores, snack shops, and tea houses facilitates the conversation between brand building and community experiences, forming an old-town atmosphere.

frontmatter.title: Introductory Journey of Play Design Hotel
frontmatter.description: Play Design Hotel received an Honorable Mention in the User Experience category in Fast Company’s 2016 Innovation by Design Awards. I was the integrated designer in the team responsible for the service design. I participated in the development of user journey and its concept. In addition to this, I worked on the design of travel guide and introductory handbook independently.
